entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
